description:
Tree works in front garden. 

 Front Garden:-  Sycamores (7)   Crown lift 4m., crown thin                                 30%.  Cut back to allow                                 1.5m. clearance from                                 building. 

                 Ailanthus       Crown lift 4m., crown thin                                 30%.  Cut back to allow                                 1.5m. clearance from                                 building. 

 Rear Courtyard:-Sycamore        Crown lift 4m., crown thin                                 30%.  Cut back to allow                                 1.5m. clearance from                                 building. 

                 Sorbus          Crown lift 3m.
